name: dtapi
description: Precompiled binary package for DekTec API (DTAPI)

vc15.description: Install precompiled binaries for vc15 (Visual Studio 2017).

vc16.description: Install precompiled binaries for vc16 (Visual Studio 2019).

vc17.description: Install precompiled binaries for vc17 (Visual Studio 2022).
